question: In order to develop and improve the capability to forecast weather, and climate and hazard-related phenomena and to explore Ocean Resources, the Ministry of Earth Sciences has launched a Teraflops High-Performance Computing System built based on IBM System X technology. The name of the system is _?
explanation: The Aaditya HPC is a Highly Parallel Supercomputing System built on IBM System X technology. It brings accuracy in weather, climate and ocean forecast and helps in providing better services to end users such as farmers and fisherman.
